headline.main: BRITISH TANK AID FOR RUSSIA HUGE; London Arranges Program for Large Part of Its Output to Go to Soviet Fronts

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Sept. 25 -- Britain has embarked on a long-term program of tank production for Russia that will entail heavy sacrifices and great risks over a period at least through next Spring, it was learned here today.
abstract: Brit aid to USSR reptd rushed
snippet: LONDON, Sept. 25 -- Britain has embarked on a long-term program of tank production for Russia that will entail heavy sacrifices and great risks over a period at least through next Spring, it was learned here today....
